title: Breaking Bad
info: +18 · 2008-2013 · Crime, Drama, Thriller · 47 minutes per episode
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to build a criminal empire while struggling with his own moral dilemmas.

title: The Crown
info: +16 · 2016–2023 · Biography, Drama, History · 58 minutes per episode
description: The biographical story of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, highlighting political rivalries, personal struggles, and pivotal moments in history.

title: The Handmaid’s Tale
info: +18 · 2017–present · Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller · 50 minutes per episode
description: In a dystopian future, a woman is forced into the role of a handmaid to bear children for a wealthy family in a totalitarian society.

title: Succession
description: A wealthy family’s patriarch has decided to step down, leading to fierce infighting among his children as they battle for control of the family empire.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The prequel to Breaking Bad, following the transformation of Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer, into the morally ambiguous lawyer Saul Goodman.
